trans-unit.source: Provides a <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> that holds the content of an XPS document.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> com o conteúdo de um documento XPS.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> contains a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> that comprises one or more <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> contém um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> que consiste em um ou mais <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elementos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A> constructor is passed a reference to a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> for writing, storing, and reading the content elements of the document.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A> recebe uma referência a um <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> para gravação, armazenar e ler os elementos do conteúdo do documento.

trans-unit.source: A new empty [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> is created by using the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Um novo vazio [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> é criado usando o <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: An existing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> is opened by using the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Um existente [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> é aberto usando o <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> root is added to an empty [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> raiz é adicionada ao vazio [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> elements with printer information and control can also be associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>, or on individual <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> elements that are stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> elementos com informações sobre a impressora e controle também podem ser associados a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>, ou em individuais <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> e <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> elementos que são armazenados na <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] consulte o XML Paper Specification (XPS) disponível para download em [ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create and close an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar e fechar um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: The following example also shows how to create and close an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir também mostra como criar e fechar um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: The target [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_metro](~/includes/tla2sharptla-metro-md.md)] package for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: O pacote [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_metro](~/includes/tla2sharptla-metro-md.md)] de destino para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> class with access to a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> and default interleaving, resource, and compression options.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> com acesso a um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> especificado e opções de compactação, recurso e intercalação padrão.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create and close an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar e fechar um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: The following example also shows how to create and close an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir também mostra como criar e fechar um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: The target package for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: O pacote de destino para <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The package compression option.
trans-unit.target: A opção de compactação do pacote.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> class that is contained in a specified <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> with specified default interleaving, resource, and compression options.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> contida em um <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> especificado com as opções de compactação, recurso e intercalação padrão especificadas.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create and close an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar e fechar um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: The following example also shows how to create and close an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir também mostra como criar e fechar um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: The path and file name of the target <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: O caminho e o nome de arquivo do <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> de destino para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The file I/O mode in which to open the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: O modo de E/S do arquivo no qual abrir o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> class that is contained in a specified <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> file with default interleaving, resource, and compression options.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> contida em um arquivo <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> especificado com as opções de compactação, recurso e intercalação padrão.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create and close an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar e fechar um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: The following example also shows how to create and close an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir também mostra como criar e fechar um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: The target package for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: O pacote de destino para <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The package compression option.
trans-unit.target: A opção de compactação do pacote.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the document as a string.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] para o documento como uma cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> class that is contained in a specified <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> with the specified default interleaving, resource, and compression options.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> contida em um <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> especificado com as opções de compactação, recurso e intercalação padrão especificadas.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create and close an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar e fechar um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: The following example also shows how to create and close an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir também mostra como criar e fechar um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: The path and file name of the target <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: O caminho e o nome de arquivo do <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> de destino para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The file I/O mode in which to open the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: O modo de E/S do arquivo no qual abrir o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The package compression option.
trans-unit.target: A opção de compactação do pacote.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> class that is contained in a specified <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> file with default interleaving, resource, and compression options.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> contida em um arquivo <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> especificado com as opções de compactação, recurso e intercalação padrão.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create and close an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar e fechar um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: The following example also shows how to create and close an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir também mostra como criar e fechar um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Adds a root <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> to the package and returns a writer.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> raiz ao pacote e retorna um gravador.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] fixed-document sequence writer for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: O gravador de sequência de documento fixo [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] para este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Although this class uses a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be a set (sequence) of one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Embora essa classe usa um nome único, um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> pode ser um conjunto (sequência) de um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> ou vários documentos.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A> method to insert content into an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A> método para inserir o conteúdo em um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: The format of the image.
trans-unit.target: O formato da imagem.

trans-unit.source: Adds a thumbnail image to the package.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma imagem em miniatura ao pacote.

trans-unit.source: The newly added <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> recém-adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Closes the XPS document <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />.
trans-unit.target: Fecha o <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> do documento XPS.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> was opened for write access, data buffers are written to the store and the physical document <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> is closed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> foi aberto para acesso de gravação de dados buffers são gravados para o armazenamento e o documento físico <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> está fechado.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Close%2A> has been called, no parts of the document can be accessed with this <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> instance.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Close%2A> foi chamado, nenhuma parte do documento pode ser acessado com este <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> instância.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to open, insert content, and close an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como abrir, inserir o conteúdo e fechar um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: The following example also shows how to open, write to, and close an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir também mostra como abrir, gravar e fechar um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the core <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties" /> of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties" /> central do documento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The core properties of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /><see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades principais do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to write.
trans-unit.target: O documento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] a ser gravado.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter" /> for writing an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter" /> para gravar um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter" /> to use for writing the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter" /> a ser usado para gravar o documento [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A> method in order to write an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A> método para gravar um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> and optionally, releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> e, opcionalmente, libera os recursos gerados.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo método público `Dispose()` e pelo método <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` invoca o método `Dispose(Boolean)` protegido com o parâmetro `disposing` definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro for true, esse método libera todos os recursos que são mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> referências.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o método `Dispose()` de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: Other objects can call <see langword="Dispose" /> multiple times.
trans-unit.target: Outros objetos podem chamar <see langword="Dispose" /> várias vezes.

trans-unit.source: When you override <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that were previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando você substituir <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, tenha cuidado em não fazer referência a objetos que foram eliminados anteriormente em uma chamada anterior para <see langword="Dispose" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como implementar <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, consulte [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre <see langword="Dispose" /> e <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [substituindo o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader" /> for reading the document.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader" /> para ler o documento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader" /> for reading the document.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader" /> para ler o documento.

trans-unit.source: Although this class uses a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be a set (sequence) of one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Embora essa classe usa um nome único, um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> pode ser um conjunto (sequência) de um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> ou vários documentos.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to get a <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.FixedDocumentSequenceReader%2A> in order to access <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> parts in an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como obter um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.FixedDocumentSequenceReader%2A> para acessar <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> partes em um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the fixed-document sequence at the root of the package.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a sequência de documento fixo na raiz do pacote.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> of the package.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> do pacote.

trans-unit.source: Although this class uses a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be a set (sequence) of one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Embora essa classe usa um nome único, um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> pode ser um conjunto (sequência) de um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> ou vários documentos.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the package is readable.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o pacote é legível.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the package is readable; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o pacote está legível; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the package can be digitally signed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o pacote pode ser assinado digitalmente.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the package can be signed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o pacote pode ser assinado; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the package is writable.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o pacote é gravável.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the package is writable; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o pacote for gravável; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The signature that is deleted.
trans-unit.target: A assinatura que é excluída.

trans-unit.source: Deletes a signature from the package.
trans-unit.target: Exclui uma assinatura do pacote.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] signatures that are associated with the package.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de assinaturas [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] associadas ao pacote.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature" /> objects that represent the signatures that are associated with the package.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature" /> objetos que representam as assinaturas que estão associadas com o pacote.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Signatures%2A> list identifies what parts are signed and whether the signatures are valid.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Signatures%2A> lista identifica quais partes são assinados e se as assinaturas são válidas.

trans-unit.source: Signs a collection of package parts by using a specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Assina uma coleção de partes do pacote usando um certificado X.509 especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o método <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to use in signing each part; or <see langword="null" /> to prompt the user to select an installed certificate.
trans-unit.target: O certificado X.509 a ser usado na assinatura de cada parte; ou <see langword="null" /> para solicitar que o usuário selecione um certificado instalado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to store the certificate in the package; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para armazenar o certificado no pacote; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Flags that indicate what dependent parts must be excluded from the signing.
trans-unit.target: Sinalizadores que indicam quais partes dependentes devem ser excluídas da assinatura.

trans-unit.source: Signs a collection of package parts with a specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Assina uma coleção de partes do pacote com um certificado X.509 especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature" /> that contains information about the signature.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature" /> que contém informações sobre a assinatura.

trans-unit.source: If `certificate` is `null`, a dialog box appears that enables the user to select an installed X.509 certificate, such as from a smart card reader.
trans-unit.target: Se `certificate` é `null`, aparece uma caixa de diálogo que permite que o usuário selecione um certificado x. 509 instalado, como um leitor de cartão inteligente.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o método <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to use in signing each part; or <see langword="null" /> to prompt the user to select an installed certificate.
trans-unit.target: O certificado X.509 a ser usado na assinatura de cada parte; ou <see langword="null" /> para solicitar que o usuário selecione um certificado instalado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to store the certificate in the package; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para armazenar o certificado no pacote; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Flags that indicate what dependent parts are excluded from the signing.
trans-unit.target: Sinalizadores que indicam quais partes dependentes são excluídas da assinatura.

trans-unit.source: The ID to assign to the signature.
trans-unit.target: A ID a ser atribuída à assinatura.

trans-unit.source: Signs a collection of package parts by using a specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Assina uma coleção de partes do pacote usando um certificado X.509 especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature" /> that contains information about the signature.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature" /> que contém informações sobre a assinatura.

trans-unit.source: If `certificate` is `null`, a dialog box appears that enables the user to select an installed X.509 certificate, such as from a smart card reader.
trans-unit.target: Se `certificate` é `null`, aparece uma caixa de diálogo que permite que o usuário selecione um certificado x. 509 instalado, como um leitor de cartão inteligente.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o método <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to use in signing each part; or <see langword="null" /> to prompt the user to select an installed certificate.
trans-unit.target: O certificado X.509 a ser usado na assinatura de cada parte; ou <see langword="null" /> para solicitar que o usuário selecione um certificado instalado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to store the certificate in the package; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para armazenar o certificado no pacote; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Flags that indicate what dependent parts to exclude from the signing.
trans-unit.target: Sinalizadores que indicam quais partes dependentes a serem excluídas da assinatura.

trans-unit.source: The ID to assign to the signature.
trans-unit.target: A ID a ser atribuída à assinatura.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to verify that <see cref="P:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.IsSignable" /> is <see langword="true" /> before signing; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para verificar se <see cref="P:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.IsSignable" /> é <see langword="true" /> antes de assinar; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Signs a collection of package parts with a specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Assina uma coleção de partes do pacote com um certificado X.509 especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature" /> that contains information about the signature.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature" /> que contém informações sobre a assinatura.

trans-unit.source: If `certificate` is `null`, a dialog box is presented that enables the user to select an installed X.509 certificate, such as from a smart card reader.
trans-unit.target: Se `certificate` é `null`, uma caixa de diálogo é exibida que permite que o usuário selecione um certificado x. 509 instalado, como um leitor de cartão inteligente.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> is thrown if `certificate` is `null` and no certificates are installed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> será gerada se `certificate` é `null` e nenhum certificado estiver instalado.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o método <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este membro dá suporte à infraestrutura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e não se destina a ser usado diretamente do código.

trans-unit.source: Use the type-safe <see cref="M:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> method instead.
trans-unit.target: Use o método <see cref="M:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> fortemente tipado em vez disso.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] thumbnail image that is associated with the document.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a imagem em miniatura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] que está associada ao documento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> that represents the thumbnail image that is associated with the document.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> que representa a imagem em miniatura que está associada com o documento.
